action.mouse_action: The mouse cursor is hovering over the "To" field.
action.general_scene_description: The screenshot shows an email client open. The user is composing an email to their boss with the subject "What should I do??". The email body says "Hi Boss, Fujitsu client wants to move the meeting to 5pm, but we have very Important Meeting. What should I do?".
action.program_description: An email client is open and displaying a composed email.
